data.name: Calculating the intersection of 2 linear equations
data.description:
# Calculating the intersection of 2 linear equations

You will get a 2 linear equations in the format: "y1=mx1 + q, y2=mx2 + q". Your task is now to calculate the intersection of the two lines. It will not happen, that the input is in a different format. You output the intersection point in the format "x/y" at the end. If the inputs are parallel lines return (None, None)

## Example:
` y=2x + 1,y=-2x + 1 --> 0/1`

It may also happen that the "m" value is not an integer number. This would then be entered in the format "0.5", for example.

## Example:

`y=0.5x + 1,y=-2x + 1 --> 0/1`

Note: It is of course also possible that the output is not an integer number </br> 
</br>
